messages.body: $SNAP is what $AAPL was in the 80â€™s. I know it, you know, she knows it, we all know it. Donâ€™t be dumber than Forrest Gump he even knew..
$SHOP $AAPL $BOTZ $ROBO https://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/shopify-inc-getting-marijuana-business-210032652.html

links.title: Shopify Inc. Is Getting Into the Marijuana Business ... and Now Artificial Intelligence, Too?
links.description: Last week, the Ontario government announced it had inked a deal with one of Canada's leading technology companies and one of the leading e-commerce firms globally, Shopify Inc. (TSX:SHOP)(NYSE:SHOP). Shopify's online platform will be used for the sale of marijuana both in store and online as part of the Ontario Cannabis Retail Corporation (OCRC), and it will be the sole distributor of the drug within the province.
